title: Investing Q&A: Small Caps vs Large Caps, Increasing Your Circle of Competence and Should Value Investors Buy Gold? Part 2 - Ep 67
itunes:title: Investing Q&A: Small Caps vs Large Caps, Increasing Your Circle of Competence and Should Value Investors Buy Gold? Part 2 - Ep 67
description:
Nearly every year, Vitaliy does a Q&A-style lecture for students at universities in Denver. But since campuses are closed, he decided to take this year's talk online. This podcast is part 2 of 2 of that recording. Enjoy!

Listen to Part 1 here-> http://investor.fm/investing-qa-small-caps-vs-large-caps-increasing-your-circle-of-competence-and-should-value-investors-buy-gold-ep-66

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
